attributes.action: Margaret Thatcher for the Face of the New £50 Note
attributes.additional_details: Just one of these notes so far has featured a woman other than the Queen and in the interests of gender equality, who would be more appropriate to feature than the first female Prime Minister of the United Kingdom?
attributes.background: The Bank of England are redesigning the £50 note following the successful redesign of the £5, £10, and £20 notes.

rejection.details:
Bank notes are the responsibility of the Bank of England, which is independent of the Government and Parliament.

You can find out how the Bank decides who will be on bank notes here: 
http://www.bankofengland.co.uk/banknotes/Pages/characters/selection.aspx
